modName: House Dres Argonian and Khajiit Armor - Morrowind Armory
summary: Are you a slaver of House Dres and you want to make an example of one of your runaway Argonian slaves? Do you have a Khajiit slave who is organizing a revolution? Do not know what to do with your older Argonian slaves who are dying? Then this mod is for you! This is leather armor made from Argonian and Khajiit skin!
descriptionHtml:
Are you a slaver of House Dres and you want to make an example of one of your runaway Argonian slaves? Do you have a Khajiit slave who is organizing a revolution? Do not know what to do with your older Argonian slaves who are dying? Then this mod is for you! This is leather armor made from Argonian and Khajiit skin!

If you have the Atvir Dres mod, this armor will go great with him.

It says purge in Daedric on the armor.

Coming in future updates:
-Dres Sload Armor
-Dres Imga Armor

What is new in 1.1?
Dres Khajiit Armor

House Dres is one of the five Great Houses of Morrowind and they're mostly known for their enslavement and cruelty to Argonians, Khajiit, and other beast races. They're mostly in charge of Dunmer agriculture, and they represent the past of pre-Tribunal Great House culture, a persistent tradition of Daedra- and ancestor-worshipping civilized Dunmer clans. Since the fall of the tribunal, this culture has spread back to the other houses.

Requires elven smithing and can be made under the leather category.

This requires the Dragonborn DLC. The game should crash on startup if you don't have it.
author: GendunDrup
